resources.string: Enter the text for your choice.

Viewing Annotations
Swipe down/up on the screen to scroll through the annotations.

Back Button
Click to return to the Story.

Action Bar Options
These are found at the top of the screen next to the title and consist of the following:
\t• View Annotations - This is the icon that looks like a little picture. Click it to go to the annotation screen where you can view user annotations.

\t• Add Annotations - This is the icon that looks like a little camera. Click it to add annotation from either taking a picture with the phones camera or picking one from the phones gallery.

\t• Return to Main Menu - This is located in the drop down menu and will return you to the main menu screen.

Illustration Gallery
This is the top gallery in the Story Fragment where the Author can add illustrations that compliment the parts of the Story contained within the current Story Fragment. To add an illustration see the Action Bar Options.

Story Fragment Text
This is the area between the Illustration Gallery and Choices. This text is the body of the Story for this particular Story Fragment. Click into this area and start type the body of the Story that should go in this Story Fragment.

Choices
These are the choices the reader has to chose from that will lead them to the next part of the Story. To add a choice see the Action Bar Options.

Random Choice Checkbox
Check this checkbox to allow for a random choice to be chosen while reading this particular Story Fragment.

Choice Text
Write in the box the statement that should be displayed to the reader when deciding on a choice to chose.

\"Link Next Story Fragment\" Button
Click this button to chose a Story Fragment to link the choice to.

Save Button
Click this button to save the choice and return to the Editing/Creating the Story Fragment.

Read Online Stories Button
Click to display the list of Stories available to read from the online webservice.

Read Downloaded Stories Button
Click to display the list of Stories available to read that are local stored on the device.

My Stories Button
Click to display the list of Stories you are creating.

<<Action Bar Options
These are found at the top of the screen next to the title and consist of the following:

\t• Return to Main Menu - This is located in the drop down menu and will return you to the main menu screen.

Search Function
Finds stories where the title or author contain the text entered into the search area.

List of Stories
Displays all stories created by the author or the created stories resulting from the search.

By long pressing on a story in the list, a popup menu appears with the following options:
\t• Publish - Select this will publish the story online for all users to read.

\t• Read - Select this to start reading the Story.

\t• Edit - Select this to edit the Story. This will display the list of Story Fragments that make up the Story for editing.

Create New Story Button
Click this to start creating a new Story.

Action Bar Options
These are found at the top of the screen next to the title and consist of the following:

\t• Return to Main Menu - This is located in the drop down menu and will return you to the main menu screen.

Title Text
Write the Title of the new Story in this box.

Author Text
Write the Author of the new Story in this box.

Save Button
Click this to save the Title and Author of the Story and move to creating the first Story Fragment.

Action Bar Options
These are found at the top of the screen next to the title and consist of the following:

\t• Return to Main Menu - This is located in the drop down menu and will return you to the main menu screen.

Search Function
Finds stories where the title or author contain the text entered into the search area.

List of Stories
Displays all stories stored online or the stories resulting from the search.

By long pressing on a story in the list, a popup menu appears with the following options:
\t• Download - Select this to download the Story to the devices local memory.
\t• Read - Select this to start reading the Story.

\"I\'m Feeling Lucky\" Button
Click to pick a story at random to start reading.

List of the Story\'s Story Fragments
Displays the list of the current Story\'s Story Fragments to the user for linking to a choice, except the Story Fragment the Choice is being added to.

Selecting a Story Fragment from the list will link it to the Choice and return you to the Edit/Add Choice screen.

Action Bar Options
These are found at the top of the screen next to the title and consist of the following:

\t• Return to Main Menu - This is located in the drop down menu and will return you to the main menu screen.

List of the Story\'s Story Fragments
Displays the list of the current Story\'s Story Fragments.

Selecting a Story Fragment will lead to the Edit Story Fragment screen where it can be edited.

Create Story Fragment Button
Click this to start creating a Story Fragment for use in the Story.

Action Bar Options
These are found at the top of the screen next to the title and consist of the following:

• Return to Main Menu - This is located in the drop down menu and will return you to the main menu screen.

Search Function
Finds stories where the title or author contain the text entered into the search area.

List of Stories
Displays all stories stored downloaded or the stories resulting from the search.

By selecting a story it will be displayed for reading.

\"I\'m Feeling Lucky\" Button
Click to pick a story at random to start reading.

Action Bar Options
These are found at the top of the screen next to the title and consist of the following:
\t• View Annotations - This is the icon that looks like a little picture. Click it to go to the annotation screen where you can view user annotations.

\t• Add Annotations - This is the icon that looks like a little camera. Click it to add annotation from either taking a picture with the phones camera or picking one from the phones gallery.

\t• Return to Main Menu - This is located in the drop down menu and will return you to the main menu screen.

Illustration Gallery
This is the top gallery in the Story Fragment where the Author has added illustrations that compliment the parts of the Story contained within the current Story Fragment. Swipe left and right to scroll through all the illustrations.

Story Fragment Text
This is the area between the Illustration Gallery and Choices. This text is the body of the Story for this particular Story Fragment. Swipe up and down to scroll through the Story text if the Story exceeds the screened area.

Choices
These are the choices the reader has to chose from that will lead them to the next part of the Story. If no choices exist it is because it is the end of a Story. By selecting one of these choices the screen will change to the Story Fragment linked to the chosen choice.
